1006.name: 307 Si
1006.Applications: Buffer layers before hardfacing, dissimilar welding between steel and stainless steel, armor plate, exhaust systems (type 409, 304), high Manganese austenitic steel, heterogeneous welding, difficult to weld steels etc.
1006.Suitable_For: Dissimilar welding between steel and stainless steel, armor plate, exhaust systems (type 409, 304), high Manganese austenitic steel, difficult to weld steels such as: 42CrMo4, C45, 42MnV7, tool steels, 1.3401, X120Mn12 etc.
